title: "Trails & Tribulations, Joys & Rewards, Epic High & Epic Lows" - With Connie Chang
itunes:title: "Trails & Tribulations, Joys & Rewards, Epic High & Epic Lows" - With Connie Chang
description:
Today the Three Black Halflings are joined by Connie Chang, the GM of Transplaner RPG, an all-trans, POC-led D&D campaign. We discuss D&D as a tool to examine yourself, gender, and unconscious bias in a safe space and building the noncolonial, anti-orientalist world of Andake in which Transplaner RPG's campaign is set.

Find Connie @byConnieChang

Find Transplaner RPG @TransplanarRPG, on Twitch and YouTube

Find Godkiller @godkillerrpg


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today the Three Black Halflings are joined by Connie Chang, the GM of Transplaner RPG, an all-trans, POC-led D&D campaign. We discuss D&D as a tool to examine yourself, gender, and unconscious bias in a safe space and building the noncolonial, anti-orientalist world of Andake in which Transplaner RPG's campaign is set.

Find Connie @byConnieChang

Find Transplaner RPG @TransplanarRPG, on Twitch and YouTube

Find Godkiller @godkillerrpg


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com
